00037 #include "egs_box.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"

00040 void EGS_Box::printInfo() const {
00041     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00042     egsInformation(" box size = %g %g %g\n",ax,ay,az);
00043     egsInformation("=======================================================\n");
00044 }
00045 
00046 string EGS_Box::type("EGS_Box");
00047 
00048 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message1[] = "createGeometry(box): %s\n";
00049 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message2[] = "null input?";
00050 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message3[] = "wrong/missing 'box size' input?";
00051 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_message4[] =
00052   "expecting 1 or 3 float inputs for 'box size'";
00053 static char EGS_BOX_LOCAL ebox_key1[] = "box size";
00054 
00055 extern "C" {
00056 
00057 EGS_BOX_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00058     if( !input ) { egsWarning(ebox_message1,ebox_message2); return 0; }
00059     vector<EGS_Float> s;
00060     int err = input->getInput(ebox_key1,s);
00061     if( err ) {
00062         egsWarning(ebox_message1,ebox_message3); return 0;
00063     }
00064     EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(input);
00065     EGS_Box *result;
00066     if( s.size() == 1 ) result = new EGS_Box(s[0],t);
00067     else if( s.size() == 3 ) result = new EGS_Box(s[0],s[1],s[2],t);
00068     else {
00069         egsWarning(ebox_message1,ebox_message4);
00070         if( t ) delete t; return 0;
00071     }
00072     if( t ) delete t;
00073     result->setName(input);
00074     result->setMedia(input);
00075     result->setLabels(input);
00076     return result;
00077 }
00078 
00079 }
